rows.label: bf11390100_0010
rows.name:
Amazing Laura. Even when I foresee your
movements, you counter me instantly.

rows.label: bf11390100_0015
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]adlib swordfighting

rows.label: bf11390100_0020
rows.name: I couldn't do it without Kasumi!

rows.label: bf11390100_0030
rows.name:
What about you? I don't see you
using Hikari's hidden ability!

rows.label: bf11390100_0040
rows.name: And what if we did?

rows.label: bf11390100_0050
rows.name: Well, if you did...

rows.label: bf11390100_0060
rows.name: I'd just have to bring out my original Blade!

rows.label: bf11390100_0070
rows.name: Adel-sama...

rows.label: bf11390100_0080
rows.name: Your evening meal is ready for you.

rows.label: bf11390100_0090
rows.name: Oh, is it that time already?

rows.label: bf11390100_0100
rows.name:
The days are so long at this time
of year, I just start losing track...

rows.label: bf11390100_0110
rows.name:
Oh, finished already? That's a shame.
I was hoping to join in.

rows.label: bf11390100_0120
rows.name: Join in? By yourself?

rows.label: bf11390100_0130
rows.name:
His Majesty has many pressing matters to
attend to. Besides, I'm used to working alone.

rows.label: bf11390100_0140
rows.name:
A Driver and Blade are one in body and
soul. That's their very nature.

rows.label: bf11390100_0150
rows.name: You're not at full strength without him.

rows.label: bf11390100_0160
rows.name: It's not so simple as all that.

rows.label: bf11390100_0170
rows.name: I know I've yet to unlock the depths of your power.

rows.label: bf11390100_0180
rows.name: Really? I feel like I've been giving it my all.

rows.label: bf11390100_0190
rows.name: But you never stop growing.

rows.label: bf11390100_0200
rows.name:
At any rate, Kasumi's ability to restrict
Blades is indispensable.

rows.label: bf11390100_0210
rows.name: It's perfect for training. We're lucky.

rows.label: bf11390100_0220
rows.name:
When she stops me using my Foresight...
It's certainly difficult.

rows.label: bf11390100_0230
rows.name:
Oh, but you honor me too much. I'm just
happy to help you both in any way I can.

rows.label: bf11390100_0240
rows.name:
...Next to each other like that, you
really do look like twins, you two.

rows.label: bf11390100_0250
rows.name:
It's rare for the Driver's nature to
appear so strongly in their Blade.

rows.label: bf11390100_0260
rows.name:
People tell me that from time to time,
but is it really true?

rows.label: bf11390100_0270
rows.name: Perhaps...

rows.label: bf11390100_0280
rows.name:
But whatever the reason, I am happy
if I look even a little like you, my lady.

rows.label: bf11390100_0290
rows.name: We're even the same dress size!

rows.label: bf11390100_0300
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: bf11390100_0310
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]

rows.label: bf11390100_0320
rows.name: By the way...

rows.label: bf11390100_0330
rows.name: We want to try taking you on next, Shin

rows.label: bf11390100_0340
rows.name: Well? How about it Shin?

rows.label: bf11390100_0350
rows.name: I'm afraid I don't particularly like fighting.

rows.label: bf11390100_0360
rows.name:
And to think we're hearing that from
"the strongest man in Iira"

rows.label: bf11390100_0370
rows.name: But perhaps there's truth in those words.

rows.label: bf11390100_0380
rows.name: After all, he...

rows.label: bf11390100_0390
rows.name: or rather, they...

rows.label: bf11390100_0400
rows.name:
My lord, my lady! We've discovered
Metsu's target!

rows.label: bf11390100_0410
rows.name: The capital!

rows.label: bf11390100_0420
rows.name: What? ...Are you sure...?

rows.label: bf11390100_0430
rows.name: Yes, no doubt about it!
